website_summaries.verdict: A rugged choice with hot pink flair for little drivers up to about 66 pounds.
pros: Has forward, reverse, and two speed choices
Accommodates media devices so driver can listen to music
Wheels with large tread can take on dirt, grass, concrete
cons: The vehicle may have difficulty on steep hills

customer_reviews.title: Look under the seat!
customer_reviews.text: During unboxing, we thought they left out assembly instructions, hardware, and the charger. Turns out all of that stuff is secured under the seat. There’s no indication you should look there—my husband just had a hunch they could be there. Otherwise, great product. Assembly took about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Quad
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box tonight and everything seems to be there and seems to be the perfect size for our 4 year old! UPDATE: our 4 year old LOVES it. He just wants to ride all the time. He gets upset when it dies!
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Ardoin

customer_reviews.title: MISSING STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: Missing: Assembly Instructions, Charger, and Other Parts such as screws. How can something brand new be missing all of this stuff???
customer_reviews.author: Ohh, Kay

customer_reviews.title: Came without battery and charger
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my sons birthday present but it came without battery and charger. So disappointed and frustrated! Now we have to return the product and pay for shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Vinton

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old and she loves it pulls good thru grass and has decent battery life
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy Quad!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves it. The features are so cool too! He rides in the dirt and blast the music. (We have a sloped property and do does well.
customer_reviews.author: mommy gaukel

customer_reviews.title: Good ATV
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grand son can go pretty much anywhere on our property which is hilly with grass, dirt & gravel. Even when wet. Has a working FM radio plus you can use USB or card, but he just uses the radio. Also, both back wheels drive it. Missing parts? Look under the seat before you flip out.
customer_reviews.author: DOwens

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I am more pleased with this four wheeler than I expected to be. My husband and I had it put together in less time than the instructions predicted. It is important to remember that some pieces are stored under the seat that are needed for assembly. My son loves it. The only warning is if the child pushes the gas and lets up and presses it again it may seem jerky in motion and if the child is going up and incline it may lift off the ground some. The four wheeler is also equipped with a radio, USB port and auxiliary cable for music.
customer_reviews.author: christina braden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for Christmas and my boys love them! One of them had the screws stripped and we had to exchange it, due to the size of the box it wasn’t the easiest thing to do, but the company was really easy to work with and very accommodating. The battery life is shorter than I’d like, especially on the higher speed. Overall these buy me time to cook supper or do other chores that would take much longer if the kids weren’t occupied!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: No instructions for assembly :(
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged great and seems very sturdy. The only thing I’m not happy with is the fact that there were no instructions or owners manual sent with it. It does require some assembly and as a single mom I was counting on there being some instructions on how to fully assemble it together.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not For Every Child
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t all that hard to assemble and assembly is not my forte. Having the two forward speeds is a problem. A child doesn’t understand that switching speeds while in motion is not good for it. Inside of a few hours the gears were stripped and the vehicle no longer functioned. The company must be used to this because there was no problem returning it with a full refund. It may also have too much power for a younger user.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Frankel

customer_reviews.title: Instructions under seat, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: LOOK UNDER THE SEAT FOR INSTRUCTION. I had a hard time finding the guide to assemble.... once I found instructions and screws it was very easy to assemble, it took about 10 minutes. Runs fast enough for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: J Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: We love this ATV. It has shut off automatically a handful of times, but turns back on and continues working. Customer service has been contacted(BCP is great) and troubleshooting resolved the issue. Batterylife has exceeded expectaions. Radio has better reception than my vehicle, usb is an awesome feature(we purchased a mini usb flash drive). ATV has been on pavement, grass, dirt and sand(less grip here). Small hills okay, play it by ear if you hear it's struggling then prob not a good idea. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar

customer_reviews.title: Great out of the box.  Better with a few modifications.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed so far. My 3 year old son (35lb) loves it. No problems yet, riding it about 1 hour every day for 2 weeks. The only things I changed is studded the tires with screws as the plastic tires offer very little traction on grassy hills. The other change was wiring in a charging plug to use that Schumacher 3 amp charger/maintainer that we bought along with the ATV. This makes charging a snap and does so 3 times quicker than the 1 amp "dumb" charger that is included.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just turned 2 and he absolutely loves this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arron

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Mine has a short in it somewhere. It didn't last 2 weeks before we started fighting it. Unfortunately it will cost an arm and leg to send back to them since I have to pay shipping. So I am out all the money for it and have an unhappy 3 year old. I had also bought a jeep. It on the other hand has actually lasted 2 years. It just started shorting out before I bought the 4 wheeler. Needless to say we will be buying from another brand after this. I would rather by batteries than buy something that shorts out in time for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2.5 year old daughter. We bought her the Jeep about a year ago or so. She still has trouble Getting the hang of steering that but she got the hang of the 4wheeler within a minute. Now she drives it all around by herself. She uses the high speed now and my husband is actually going to make it go faster soon. The battery life definitely doesn’t last as long since she keeps it in the high speed mode. But this thing is awesome! Makes it through quite a bit for having plastic wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quick little quad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson (he's 2) to play on. It's a good size for him and plenty fast enough for his grandmother to have to jog to keep up. It has lots of little noises that are control activated and also has a line-in if you want to let your child listen to an iPod or something. We didn't so I don't know how well it works. If I had a beef, it's that the hubcaps don't stay on very well. I'm not worried about it so I just took them off.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Timm

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price are good.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled quickly, charged battery overnight and its still going strong after a week and 3-4 rides. My daughter loves it. Doesn't go too fast for her, she's 6 and it fits her well with room to grow. We wanted something to last her and not be too small. She learned the controls quickly and has a lot of fun with it. It looks good and I love the handle on the back to pull it when it's time to put it away!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Keep serching.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son as a birthday present in April 2020. I'm writing this review June 2020. It doesn't charge or turn on anymore. We tried replacing the battery with another toy he has to see if the battery was the problem, as and it wasn't. Didn't even last 3 months with light use in our backyard. Contacted the seller and said it was passed the 60 days warranty. What a waste of money. Stay away from this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: ary

customer_reviews.title: Stop Working
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought it for my granddaughters birthday in July and it’s beautiful sturdy rides great until it STOP working barely a month old! This is ridiculous. My daughter failed to read the reviews before ordering it and apparently this lil 4-wheeler has a defect more than half of the reviews say the same thing it STOP working after 1-2 months😔I have requested a refund have not heard anything yet😡
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Spornack

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & no missing items
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo loves it. I personally think it’s a little small for him. I’m not sure how long we’ll be able to keep it but it gets the job done. The radio and lights are super cute. It has an Aux cord but no place to hold the phone which is awkward. ATTENTION!! The instructions, screws, battery, etc are located under the seat. You must unscrew the seat to find the missing items!
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Wiring went out immediately
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought, because I thought I killed the first one by accidentally leaving it in the rain. But this one died within just a few weeks. First the wiring started going out so that the slow and fast switch didn't do anything and the 4wheeler was stuck going fast. Then it would start but not drive when you hit the peddle. Then it stopped coming on all together. Just in a few weeks of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Berezin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made. Steering wheel broke within 2 months they wouldn't cover it under warranty and I couldn't order because they were out of stock. 1 week after 6 month warranty it quit charging. I had to plead with the company to give me a replacement. It was difficult sending it back because of size. After waiting 2 weeks I called to check status and they notified me it was out of stock so refund is being issued. Save your time and money do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and so far safe...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who just turned 4 and she absolutely loves it..... While assembling I was concerned about the size, thought it looked a bit small considering our daughter is tall for her age but once she got on it I quickly realized it's perfect. The battery so far has been lasting a good 4 hours and that's with her going up hills, over grass and rocks. The radio works great and I like the way it comes to a stop, don't really have to worry about her flying due to a recent stop. I would recommend this for any kid 3-5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Pagan

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loves his
customer_reviews.text: This toy is much bigger than I would have expected, it's almost the size of a child's ATV. My son is over the moon and the power wheel thus far has held it's charge. The only negative thing about this product is that the directions to put it together are under the seat that is screwed down. We didn't figure this out until it was put together and we took the seat apart to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barr

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson, and it stopped working completely about a month later amd only has about 45 minutes on it , and he is only 2 years and weight 23lbs, so i know it wasnt anything he done to exhaust it, stopped charging and no powet at all! Very dissapointing!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: stacy burleson

customer_reviews.title: Would rather not have baught it.
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect Christmas gift for my 3 year old daughter, from Santa! By the 3rd day which only had about 3 hours of run time, its a rattle trap, won't got in low speed an won't go in reverse. On the flip side the radio is great she loves it pink an black fits my daughter an it isn't easy to flip thought my daughter was going to do a OTB acouple times but it rolled on perfect. But how do I tell her I sent it back to Santa ? She's 3
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pence

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why people gave this less than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Got it 3 days ago and my kids can’t stop riding it.. i have 3 and 4 year old and they both ride on it (sometimes together) and it works fine. Looks amazing and for that price you can’t really ask for more. * it also came 90% installed. All I had to do was to install the tires and charge it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Avi Sage

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves the radio
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this things and so does my son. The radio and mini sd card for music is so nice and the kids love riding around the yard listening to their favorite songs. The only issue I have with it is that the battery does not last very long. I also had to replace the charger as the plug broke after only a few months.
customer_reviews.author: S. Homan

customer_reviews.title: Great decision to buy.
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old son loves it! He doesn’t like high speed because it IS fast, so for now he prefers low speed. This is perfect since he hasn’t quite figured out the handling of it, we can walk beside, correcting his direction. He loves the reving sounds when it comes on. The handles are easy to turn. The radio is great. It’ll go on a lot of terrain but it gets stuck on some large roots & mud hills but I think when he weighs more it’ll help with that. I can see where some reviewers 5-6 yo still ride. We’ll be enjoying this for a long time too!
customer_reviews.author: Reid Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Christmas. Ridden a dozen or so times this spring. There was clearly a short in the foot pedal/accelerator connection. When the accelerator was pressed it would only move a short distance before shorting out. The ATV would then shut off and turn back on without prompting. Contacted Best Choice products. They refused a refund stating it was past the return window. I then reached out to purchase a new foot pedal and replace ourselves. I was told they do not sell parts and suggested I buy a new unit. I’ve looked online for parts sold separately with no luck. Look elsewhere for a more reputable company and products!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bu product out of the country. It cost a bundle to return
customer_reviews.text: The product is not what appears. Also to return it I had to pay 125.00. Ridiculous that Amazon allows this . Paying freight that high for a product that is NOT what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mery Jones-Prout

customer_reviews.title: Seller set Up! Its wrong !
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved the powerwheel to me The quality wasn't what I expected or what was in the description I requested to return it seller approved it but I had to pay for the return which cost me a $170 $30 less then what it is worth the reason the seller okays it is so that you can keep it. RUDE ! If it was what I thought it would be I woulda kept it because Halley's exchanged it for a better quality one and I would have paid the difference
customer_reviews.author: H.K.N

customer_reviews.title: Wont last a month
customer_reviews.text: All the switches will stop working if they get even a little wet. After having for only a month, My son left it out in the yard and the sprinkler hit it and two switches stopped working. I paid $30 to return it for a new one. My don drove it after swimming in the pool. The drips from his swim suit made the gas pedal stop working a week after we had the new unit. They refuse to exchange or refund because 60 days has passed. It has been 70 days and half of that time has been the two units shipping.
customer_reviews.author: field biologist

customer_reviews.title: Country Life
customer_reviews.text: We live out in the country and had a hard time finding a kiddie vehicle that can handle our property. Needless to say, we settled on this one and couldn't be any happier. It had no problems with sand, gravel, pot holes, or hills. It pushes through with little to no effort. It offers the higher speed, for when she gets older. It's headlights work perfectly fine for nighttime riding. All in all, the overall build of this vehicle is excellent and I'd recommend it to anyone who is looking for a solid good ride for their kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: She barely rode it for a hour
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few weeks ago for my daughters birthday. It didn’t get put together until last week. She didn’t ride it until TWO days ago for less than a total of 1 hr of riding time. Now it won’t go!!!! It turns on but when pressing the pedal you get NO MOVEMENT!!! Not very pleased at all about this. Started a return but have yet to hear anything. If I don’t get a response within the next day I’ll be filing a claim
customer_reviews.author: leelee

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons, 4 and 2 love these. They have 2 speeds and are really durable. My 4 year old zooms around every where on it. He has never tipped it over and believe me, he's tried. The 2 year old loves his just as much especially since he has one just like his brother. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4-wheeler for the price be aware the battery is not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute 4-wheeler for kids. My son is 4 and maneuvers the 4-wheeler with ease. Only took about 20 min to assemble. Charged the battery overnight. My son rode it around for about 2 hours and the battery was completely dead. My yard is not hilly if you have more hills or uneven ground the battery will probably not last two hours. Overall it’s a great toy for the price just wish it came with a longer lasting battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy & Disappointed Customer
customer_reviews.text: Four-wheeler was easy to assemble and ran great, my 3 year old LOVED it but after only 2 months it stopped running. I contacted to see if they could help us out with a replacement or at very least a source for parts but they were unable to help. These little machines are not cheap and I would expect one to last more than a few hours of ride time or at the very least some help remedying our problem.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it was gonna be. Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good buy. Although my niece rode it on her birthday she couldn’t reverse in it, the tires are plastic so it couldn’t really move around in the grass, and it is really cheap feeling. It had some cool features but for the money I rather save and get her the real thing. I ask for a refund and to return the item. I never heard back from the seller but Amazon refunded my money. Thank goodness. A bad buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bouyea Amen-El

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about four months. The charger quit working. Company wouldn’t replace. Paid for and ordered another. That one quit working at well. My husband rigged up a makeshift charging system. Doesn’t last long. The start button gets a little bit of dirt in it, it hangs up and won’t turn on. There’s a glitch somewhere and it will also just shut off while our son is riding. Not sturdy, tires tearing up quick. Wouldn’t buy another or recommend. Six months in (as of now) and it won’t operate in the slow mode. Only in fast and it picks and chooses when it will go in reverse. Hate this for our son. Not fair to him.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Annie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied 🤎🤎
customer_reviews.text: I like that destruction came with the product the tools came with the product but it was underneath the seat the only thing I dislike Is that in the instructions it does not tell you to put the suspenders up for the chair I use this product for my son he loves driving it around he especially love the faster mode which is the 4 mph It was delivered fast even during the quarantine very easy to set only took up to 20 to 30 minutes to set up
customer_reviews.author: Widline

customer_reviews.title: Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought the quad for my 5-year old daughter's bday back in March, it was very easy to assemble the instructions were right on point, however, a month later it's just sitting outside our backyard due to it not wanting to work anymore. I've left it charging for 24 hrs. or more the red and green light turns on but when I unplugged the charger from the quad and try to turn it on it does not. Do not waste your money on it, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a day
customer_reviews.text: Fully Charged the battery, the ATV worked great, daughter had fun rode for a good long time no issues. Brought the ATV into the sun room connected to charger and that was the last time it ran. It looks like it should run but it doesn't move, the little charging light is green but nothing. So with the for reliability and purchase security I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Big Black

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Worked for almost a week, one wheel stopped working. Reverse stopped working. Battery lasts about 30 minutes. Disappointed when left message for seller and no response back.
customer_reviews.author: danielle grande

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 2 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for about 2 months now and it just stopped charging. Nothing was damaged by us in any way, it just stopped charging/working. We had problems when we first got it with the handlebars and had to fix that as well. Now we have a heartbroken 3 year old and we are out $200. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Foley

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less then month, seller ignored contact for replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working within 3 weeks of buying it. Tried to contact seller and they never returned any form of contact about my concerns of trying to get a replacement. Had a mechanic look at it and a circuit board fried that they don't sell separate so it's complete junk. For the money it should have had at least a 60 day warranty. Don't waste your money, it will break your child's heart to fall in love and then lose it. Or at least go with a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Star Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl loves her 4 wheeler that looks so much like daddy's. It came in a box and my husband didn't have a problem putting it together. The battery life is very good. She rode it a while and it still has battery life.
customer_reviews.author: BJMx2

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Had for about a month for my 4 year old and she rides it every day for about an hour. Reverse Option is already out. I’m reading the reviews and I’m expecting the entire ATV to stop working soon.
customer_reviews.author: awesome game

customer_reviews.title: DEAD IN 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I was loving this 4 wheeler when we got it because my 3 year old had a huge smile everytime he rode it. I bought in Dec 2019 for Christmas, and worked for a good 3 months. It stopped working for some reason, will not start. I drained and filled the battery up to try to get it to stay and no luck. Trashing this thing seems like a waste but it's a waste of space for a non working power wheel.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A real hit with my grandson and his parents.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old grandson. He brings it to my house a rides it around my back yard. A sturdy and good performing item. His parents are highly impressed with it. Most of all; He has a blast while ridin it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Bolita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter birthday. It was estimated to arrive on the 12th of May but it arrived on the 8th which was her birthday. She was excited and enjoys this tremendously. It features an AM/FM radio as well as the aux for plugging up a phone and listing to tunes. <3
customer_reviews.author: BrennaF

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this quad for my five year old son. He loved it rode it everyday. One month after having it the drive wheel broke. I contacted the company for repair/replacement sent it in and that was it. This started back in April. Now, towards the end of over 100 emails they finally processed a refund last month which at this point we have still not received. Emailed again this morning so now we wait and see. I would avoid Best Choice Products as much as possible. Hope this saves many people the headache we are still dealing with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 4yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4yr old loves this ATV. Intuitive controls, super fast for a kid, and he had a big grin the entire ride! Easy to put together - look under seat for instructions. No comment about battery life because it is brand new, but, if you get any ride-on, remember to give it a full charge the first time(10-12 hrs usually) to get maximum battery life.
customer_reviews.author: RAMUSN

customer_reviews.title: Product never worked so I cant give feedback
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my quad had to be sent back to the manufacturer. Despite assembling the product per instructions and charging it as recommended, it never turned on. I was super disappointed as this was supposed to be my son's Christmas gift....needless to say, that was a bust. At this point I am still waiting for the replacement to arrive, hopefully i'll have better luck with the next one. I will say though that best choice products was great about listening to my concerns and trying to rectify the situation. They even paid for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Syreeta Ford

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler happy daddy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase ATV for my daughter Birthday. She’s 3 and she loves riding her ATV. Really fast, nice on slow mode. Built in radio. Item arrived couple days early. Really happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Bbmin

customer_reviews.title: Overall great!
customer_reviews.text: We have an earlier edition of this same 4 wheeler and liked it enough to buy a second one. I like that there is an input to plug in for charging now without having to unscrew the seat. We were confused at first when assembling because the instructions and some of the nuts and bolts were hiding inside the seat compartment. Overall, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves it! We had one of the bass peo shops trucks but it wouldnt even go in grass. Our 4 yr old can take this one over the yard even with the plastic tires. He jams out to country music on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 2.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My nephew received this about a month ago and it is used entirely outside. So far, low gear has been best and it didn't take him long to figure it out. It has been used on gravel, grass and snow!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Glanz

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!! Kid loves it.awsome features and super battery.
customer_reviews.text: This atv is amazing.Got it for my 6yr old so it's carrying 60 lbs for reference.The battery has never died on him.we charge battery at night and he drives all day.I don't understand how it lasts.Has 2 speeds and reverse,4 lights in front,and a USB and auxiliary port.$199 and worth every penny.It exceeded every expectation. Thoroughly happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, all parts were there. It this little quad is HORRIBLE. it is extreme melt fragile. ALL my daughter did for ONE week was ride in our front yard which is flat, and grassy, and completely tore up the wheel. We never left her unattended while in it and always made sure she was being careful with the vehicle, it’s just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This quad is the perfect size for my two year old. He can reach the pedals and the handlebars with ease. Goes the perfect speed and easy to turn on and charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 Y/O grandson and he loves it!!! It has headlights, horn sound, vroom sound , blue tooth and auto shut off. He's loving it! goes kind of fast but not too fast for a young child!
customer_reviews.author: tennisgirl

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This is on the second review that I have ever made. I bought this in lat January for my 3 year old daughters birthday. Product seemed ok she rode it one time on the drive way. I put it back in the building. Went to get it out the other day wouldn’t do anything. There is a power button you press to turn it on and nothing. I email “best choice products” they said there were sorry that it was out of there 60 day window. So no battery no nothing the worst customer service I have ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: It’s very small
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super tiny. I figured for a 12 volt it would fit a 5-6 year old comfortable but my kids legs are too long. Pretty disappointed because the return is going to cost as much as the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great quad!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy my 3 year old loves it. Wakes up in the morning and wants to ride his quad. Battery is like any of these kin of toys doesn’t last very long so buy a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter’s birthday and was so lucky to receive it the day before. Assembled it and charged it but the battery seems to last only about 40 mins and it’s not as good on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 defective ATVs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this ATV for our daughter. After a few rides, the battery was on, but the ignition wouldn't start. We had to pay $110 to send it back to receive another ATV, and even the 2nd was defective with the same issue! We were given a free shipping label for the second ATV but we are still out $110 shipping the first defective ATV back. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: That's why I'm telling you about this product . The battery life on this toy is only about 30 minutes after a full charge. Which I feel like its should be longer . Canucks tell me if there is something wrong with my product and what's the normal life of the battery for this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in January and purchased the extended warranty. It quit working in May. After going through all the stuff with The extended warranty company they said it’s a bad battery and the battery needs to be replaced. It lasted only five months. Other than that, it worked well and was a great speed for a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Emm Heida

customer_reviews.title: Reverse doesn’t work! The car doesn’t run someone help me get this fixed!
customer_reviews.text: I received this on Wed and my daughter used it one time and the reverse doesn’t work on it so ok it wasn’t a big deal to me we have a lot of land so I put it inside my house and charged it when the light turns green I unplug it well this morning it didn’t work it doesn’t turn all at all can I get someone to contact me please I really like it but I need a running car that’s what I paid for and this thing isn’t working hard.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Campos

customer_reviews.title: Your child will be disappointed after two months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my three-year-old daughter she loved it when it worked now the power just stays on better four wheeler does not move at all tried calling the company said that it was only a 60 day warranty that they would send me out a manual to troubleshoot why it doesn’t work they will not guarantee their product over 60 days so now my daughter has no four wheeler it’s a $200 piece of junk. I tried calling them and they told me that they would send me out a manual but they won’t do anything else
customer_reviews.author: Charles Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: One mad grandma
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of this brand wheeler. The last one I ordered June 24, 2020. Went to see my 3 year old grand son 6 hours away from me, and this second wheeler I had ordered for him is broke. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Zinter

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for Christmas, my boys 3&5 were able to ride them about 4 times before they quit working. Now we did leave them outside overnight and it rained. They stopped working after that. Their power wheels are left out all the time in the weather and keep going, didn’t think we needed to worry about these. My dad is a mechanic and ordered some parts and is going to try and fix them otherwise they would be in the trash by now.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad service.
customer_reviews.text: i bought a quad ride for my son's birthday present. and I received a Jeep. besides being cheaper than what i bought. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RUNAWAY FROM BEST CHOICE PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: THE ELECTRIC ATV WAS GIVEN AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT... NEVER ABUSED AT ALL.... AND FIRST WEEK OF MARCH IT JUST STOPPED WORKING AT BEST CHOICE PRODUCTS JUST DOESN'T CARE... NO PARTS . NO SERVICE.... NO REPLACEMENT..... THE BEST THEY COULD OFFER IS TO BUY ANOTHER ONE..... NEVER AGAIN WOULD I BUY A BEST CHOICE PRODUCT AGAIN THEY DO NOT STAND BEHIND THEIR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy & great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Put wheels on, handle bars, and snap back seat on and you're good to go. Wish the plug in was more accessible (you need to take the seat off to plug it in) but that's my only thing I dont like about it. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is a great size but terrible quality! No abuse or heavy use, kept in doors when not in use and the handle bars broke off in 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: J.H!!

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed. It died.
customer_reviews.text: I am SOOOO dissapointed... My boys LOVED this 4wheeler and after only 2 months it died on them and wont drive anymore. It was great while it lasted. My boys are only 3 and 4 and their string beans so it couldn't be from them being rough on it. I will never buy one of these products again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Great product- sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The video is on low speed as it was not fully charged but she LOVES it, plays her music and is very stable - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great! My twins are 4 years old, almost 5 and are both tall. These are perfect size for them and have room to grow. The battery lasts several hours. The charging is super easy, no need to remove batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Benway

customer_reviews.title: 4 months old & broken. Unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: Weve had it 4 months, stored indoors. The reverse doesn't work anymore & neither does the slow speed. It also bucks my 4 & 5 year old off all the time. Definitely unsafe. We live on a farm & it handles rough terrain well though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayci Dixon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not come with useful instructions. You have to you tube or figure it out yourself. We have had the ATV for 2 months and 1 week and it is no longer working at all. I contacted the seller and they basically said too bad. HORRIBLE HORRIBLE customer service. Do yourself a favor and spend the money on power wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go down a driveway.
customer_reviews.text: The battery last A few hours, pretty easy to assemble and my daughter loved it! However the reason for the 4 stars is because within the first 20 minutes of riding it she went down the drive and made a left onto the side walk and it tipped over. She broke her forearm in 2 places! We ended spending most of the day (on her birthday) in the emergency room. So if you are going to buy the product I recommend NOT GOING DOWN A HILL, NOT EVEN A DRIVEWAY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! He got it for his second birthday and hasn't stopped riding it since. We have gravel, grass and dirt.. It does well on all 3
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for my twin 3 year olds. After only riding a hand full of times and storing indoors, one quit working. The company let me return (I had to pay to get a box big enough) and sent me a new one after they received the broken one. -3 weeks with no quad and a sad kid. Within a month the new one quit working. So here we are again with 2 kids and 1 quad. So frustrating and feel the quality is horrible. Never buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated consumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our almost 3 yr old. He’ll be 3 in just a few weeks. It was super easy to put together! We had a red Jeep from the same company and unfortunately our dogs had chewed that up. But he loves this one too The only thing I wish this had that the red Jeep is a remote control.
customer_reviews.author: katarina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This atv stopped working after a week. Not sure what happened. It worked fine then just stopped it wasn’t the battery maybe wiring I was given a full refund. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON’T do it
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about 2 weeks for a very small child (3 years old) and it is almost completely non functional. First it did work fine and my son loved it. Then low speed stopped working (next day). Then reverse stopped working (following week). Now only one rear tire spins in high speed. So it is very close to not working at all in a matter of 2 weeks, used <1 hr/day. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Clark

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s worth the money can’t complain to much.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and looks awesome my son loves it. The speed is pretty good in grass doesn’t slow down till the battery is dying. And the spot where the kids feet go could be a little longer with shoes on don’t leave much room for my son foot to push the petal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I thougt this would be perfect for my son.He was so excited but he only got to ride it 2xs! Then it just would run on low for like a few seconds and then stop and start a clicking sound and then another sound .It just quit.So pretty bummed.I had to get a hold of the name brand company and talked to someone on a chat and now I have to send it back.☹️ I do get a refund.So it might of been just a defect🤷
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Delaurentis

customer_reviews.title: It just quit pretty decent if you only want it for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine, the next day the audio still works and everything but it won't drive....of course outside of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The on/off switch has a short in it after 3 months of use and no one can help us locate a part.
customer_reviews.text: I have been unsuccessful in my attempts to purchase a new switch. This children's vehicle is parked inside when not in use. The Customer service rep is not able to help me as this was an Amazon purchase and there were no packing slips with tracking numbers. This is an expensive purchase mistake on my part. I would not order again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old girl loves this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ONLY negative thing I can say about this bike is the battery life, it doesn’t last long. If you use it make sure to put it back on the charger after use. Other then that my 5 year old LOVES this thing not that fast but fast enough for her. Not a fan of the radio either but not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Carlos317404

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good and sturdy. Just smaller then showns on pictures My daughter is.48 inch and the 4wheeler it too small for her .if you have a tall kid like I do. Get something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Must by for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: This little wheeler is awesome! My sone loves it so much. Rides almost everyday and goes everywhere! Great buy and would get again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Honestly better then advertised
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves it. It lasts for around 2 hours of run time which is pretty good. The atv is a little beast he takes it over some pretty rough terrain. One thing i didn't notice in the description was the fact it has a full functional fm radio built in which is pretty neat. Definitely worth the money if anything its worth way more in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I just have to stop and take a moment to review this product. I usually do not take the time to do this unless something majorly impresses me. Well this was well worth the money and I give it five stars. This 4 wheeler is so neat from my three-year-old it has a real radio, headlights, sounds like a horn and an engine revving. I would highly highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hutto

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Sooo worth the money!! My sons little $50 wheeler wasn’t cutting it anymore!! He loves for me and his daddy to ride on it with him and it still goes pretty fast! I weigh 120 pound my husband weighs about 160! I’m aware we are over the weight limit but it holds my son and one of us well and doesn’t slow down.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Paige sloan

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 12V Kids 4-Wheeler ATV Quad Ride-On Car Toy w/ 3.7mph Max, LED Headlights, AUX Jack, Radio - Black
feature_bullets: RUGGED, STYLISH DESIGN: This ride-on ATV is built tough and equipped with realistic features to build your kid's sense of imagination and adventure
REALISTIC FUNCTIONALITY: Drives like the real thing, with a foot pedal accelerator, forward/reverse function, and 2 speed selections (high & low) with a thrilling 3.7 mph max speed
CONNECT YOUR MUSIC: A built-in AUX outlet allows kids to plug in media devices to drive while jamming to their own selection of music (AUX cable included)
LARGE TREADED WHEELS: With 4-wheel suspension, the ride-on can conquer grass, dirt, driveways, and sidewalks, while its LED headlights and a horn create a fun and realistic ATV experience!
RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: Includes a 12V battery with a charger for lasting fun throughout the seasons!; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 39.5"(L) x 26"(W) x 29.5"(H); Weight Capacity: 66 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars695 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
